Nexco.ai

Nexco uses AI to create a noninvasive, on-going conversation between headhunters and senior talent

Email: contact@nexco.ai
Contact

For professionals

In senior leadership, staying connected is crucial. Your career is more than a LinkedIn timeline - it's an evolving story of motivations, aspirations, and potential. We share this rich narrative with key decision-makers, often through networks you didn't know existed. By discreetly circulating insights about your current satisfaction, salary expectations, and future goals, we keep you visible for opportunities that truly align with your ambitions. Whether you're actively seeking a new role or excelling in your current one, we ensure you're always prepared for that next big opportunity.

For headhunters

Finding the right executive candidates requires a lot of up-to-date information. Tools like LinkedIn help, but they don't tell the whole story. Researchers often spend too much time digging for details. Our AI changes this. It automatically collects and updates important information about candidates that you can't easily get elsewhere. This frees up your team to focus on what they do best - using their expertise to make great matches. With our AI handling the basic data work, your researchers can do more of the high-level thinking that really matters.

For hiring managers

Senior hiring is critical, but the process doesnâ€™t have to be a battleground. The true differentiator lies in understanding high-caliber individuals on a deeper level. Finding the right leader, for the right challenge, at just the right time is what defines successful hiring. This requires richer, real-time information beyond what's available on LinkedIn. Our AI system gathers this directly from individuals, continuously updated, allowing us to precisely match talent with opportunity when it matters most.
